name: Cybele Venture Capital
overview:
Cybele Group is a full service consulting and financial services firm, which provides investment banking, brokerage and asset management services to both corporations and a wide array of clients, ranging from individuals and small businesses to the world’s largest corporations and governments.

Our clients benefit from our expertise: comprehensive global services, extensive subsidiaries and affiliates, a professional investment banking and corporate finance team, plus significant securities research.

We provide customized solutions to meet the investment needs of our world- wide clients in the areas of private equity. We facilitate growth of early stage life science companies by nurturing them into quality public investment companies, and aim to achieve superior risk-adjusted returns to our investors.

Our domestic and international advisory services include corporate strategy and structure, tactical fronts, capital fundraising, use of varying financial instruments, and management of investment assets - all while controlling risk policy. Our expertise is based on an in-depth knowledge of our clients’ needs and the industries and environments in which they operate.

We specialize in research-driven investment banking, focusing on high growth entrepreneurial sectors such as Israel’s technology sector. As a result, our clients benefit from our insight into investment opportunities and our well established contacts with domestic and international growth investors.
